org.apache.flink.runtime.fs.hdfs

类 HadoopFileStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.fs.hdfs.HadoopFileStatus
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    FileStatus

    public final class HadoopFileStatus
extends java.lang.Object
implements FileStatus
    Concrete implementation of the FileStatus interface for the Hadoop Distribution File System.
